title: RP to IP converter ?
body:
So was thinking i always have like 72 rp and stuff after my binge buy on payday and well it never does anything what if riot added a RP to IP converter so you could just ditch the lil rp you have for some more ip 

Thoughts?

replies.body: This would make league more of a pay to win for the pure reason that runes cost IP, and it's the only performance enhancing thing in the shop.
they have ip boosts for wins and days for this purpose
